entries.femaleVariant: We have a breaking development in an ongoing story â€“ a tragic end in the search for young teens abducted by Anthony Harris, also known as Peter Pan.
The NCPD did not manage to locate the abducted boys in time to save their lives.
They were found on an abandoned farm, dead from dehydration and exhaustion.
The case of Peter Pan has proved yet another example of Night City's moral collapse.

Crime in Night City is now double the rate than in the New United States. At this point, it seems a near guarantee that closer ties with the Union would help get this city's security back on the right track.
Stay tuned for more details after the break.
